decision_conditions: <p>Insufficient information has been submitted to ensure no unacceptable effects upon protected species from the development or its construction, with a particular emphasis on the potential impacts on bats within the site, which is contrary Policy G6 of the&nbsp; London Plan (2021), Policy CS1F of the Harrow Core Strategy (2012); Policies DM20 Harrow’s Development Management Policies (2013), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).&nbsp;<br></p>

<p>The proposed extensions, by virtue its excessive bulk, scale and mass, result in significant harm to the special character and appearance of the conservation area and locally listed Pinnerwood Cottage, and setting of the locally listed Pinnerwood Farmhouse and Grade II Pinnerwood House,&nbsp; with no clear and convincing justification for this harm, nor public benefits to outweigh it.&nbsp;As such, it would not preserve the rural character and appearance of the Conservation Area, interest of the locally listed buildings &amp; special interest of the setting of the Pinnerwood House Listed Building, contrary to the high-quality design aspirations of the National Planning Policy Framework (2023), Policies D3 and HC1 of The London Plan (2021), Policies DM1 and DM7 of Harrow’s Development Management Policies Local Plan document (2013); the relevant provisions of the adopted Harrow Supplementary Planning Document Residential Design Guide (2010); and Pinnerwood Farm Conservation Area Appraisal and Management Strategy.</p><p><br></p>

<p>The proposed development, by reason of its substantial massing and bulky design at first floor level, would result in an inappropriate addition that creates a visually obtrusive dwelling, to the detriment of the openness of the Green Belt, contrary to Policies D3, &amp; G2 of the&nbsp; London Plan (2021), Policies CS1.B &amp; F of the Harrow Core Strategy (2021); Policies DM1 and DM16 Harrow’s Development Management Policies (2013), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).&nbsp;<br></p>
description: Single and two storey rear extension; single storey side extension; external alterations (demolition of rear extension, double garage, conservatory, side canopy, oil store and removal of swimming pool)
